typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as float,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as float,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesOrder
CloudSalesOrder select(mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrderUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(SourceSystemID = 'SouthridgeCloudSales') ~> CreateRecordIDs
CloudSalesOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SelectColumnsSalesOrderDetails
SelectColumnsSalesOrderDetails derive(SourceSystemID = 'SouthridgeCloudSales') ~> AddingSourceSystemName
CreateRecordIDs sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOrders.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeSalesOrders
AddingSourceSystemName sink(input(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		OrderCreatedDate as string,
		OrderUpdatedDate as string,
		OrderDetailID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DetailsCreatedDate as string,
		DetailsUpdatedDate as string,
		SourceSystemID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesOrderDetails.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeSalesOrderDetails
